snippet: The home builder Taylor Morrison said on Monday that it planned to raise as much as $602 million in an initial public offering, seeking to take advantage of a nascent revival in the housing markets.
abstract: The home builder Taylor Morrison said on Monday that it planned to raise as much as $602 million in an initial public offering, seeking to take advantage of a nascent revival in the housing markets.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Taylor Morrison Sets I.P.O. Price at $20 to $22 a Share
